# Reads in total RNA reads count data
```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(DESeq2)
rna <- read.csv("phase1234_totalRNA_reads_count_ready.csv",header=T,row.names=1)
```

# Read in sample table
```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
sample <- read.csv("totalRNA_sample_table.csv",header=T,row.names=1)
```

# Match reads count  and sample tables
```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE,results='hide'}
sample <- sample[order(rownames(sample)),]
rna <- rna[,colnames(rna) %in% rownames(sample)]
rna <- rna[,order(colnames(rna))]
nrow(rna)
ncol(rna)
colnames(rna) == rownames(sample)
```

# Get vst data of all samples
```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = rna,colData = sample,design = ~ ~ Phase + Sex + probality + FinalDriverPathway.10Jan2020)
keep <- rowSums(counts(dds)) >= 10
dds <- dds[keep,]
dds <- DESeq(dds,minReplicatesForReplace=Inf)
vst <- vst(dds,blind = F)
write.csv(assay(vst),"totalRNA_vst.csv")
vst_data <- assay(vst)
```

# Get top 1000 most variable genes among all samples
```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
TopVarGenes <- head(order(rowVars(vst_data),decreasing=TRUE),1000)
top_vst <- vst_data[TopVarGenes, ]
write.csv(rownames(top_vst),"top1000_most_variable_genes_tumor_normal_all_totalRNA.csv")
```

# Hierarchical clusting with the tool the Consensus Cluster Plus
```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(ConsensusClusterPlus)
results2 <- ConsensusClusterPlus(top_vst,maxK=10,reps=100,pItem=0.9,pFeature=1,clusterAlg="hc",distance="pearson",plot="png",title="top1000_most_variable_genes_totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clustering_CCP")
write.csv(results2[[2]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k2.csv")
write.csv(results2[[3]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k3.csv")
write.csv(results2[[4]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k4.csv")
write.csv(results2[[5]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k5.csv")
write.csv(results2[[6]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k6.csv")
write.csv(results2[[7]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k7.csv")
write.csv(results2[[8]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k8.csv")
write.csv(results2[[9]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k9.csv")
write.csv(results2[[10]]$consensusClass,"totalRNA_tumor_normal_all_tumor_clust_CCP_top1000mostvariable_k10.csv")
```
